text: Ruyan Guo is an electrical engineer and the Robert E. Clarke Endowed Professor at the University of Texas, San Antonio. Guo was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for her contributions to the understanding of polarization phenomena in ferroelectric solid-solution systems. == References == ==External links== * IEEE Fellow entry Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Texas at San Antonio faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Pennsylvania State University alumni
title: Ruyan Guo
